alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Northwestern San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 11:01PM MST until December 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Total snowfall accumulations ranging from 1 to 2 feet with localized amounts up to 3 feet or more. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northwest San Juan Mountains, Grand and Battlement Mesas and Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Northwestern San Juan Mountains
